mapper.sql: recruit_idx , job_idx , company_name , title , location , job_type , expiration_date , close_type , category , experience_level , required_education_level , salary , applycnt , active , url , company_href
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_recruit_scrap ( scrap_idx, recruit_idx, member_idx, create_time ) VALUES ( #{scrap_idx}, #{recruit_idx}, #{member_idx}, NOW() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_recruit_scrap WHERE recruit_idx=#{recruit_idx} AND member_idx=#{member_idx}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_recruit a left join tbl_recruit_scrap b on a.recruit_idx = b.recruit_idx where member_idx=#{member_idx} ORDER BY b.create_time DESC LIMIT #{pageDto.paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex}, #{pageDto.recordsPerPage}
